name: Object Possession, Greater
target: unattended Gargantuan or smaller object (minimum Tiny) or construct
text:
This spell functions as object possession, except as noted above. The possessed animated object has a number of Construction Points appropriate for its size (up to 5 CP for Gargantuan objects). Your silver cord extends to medium range (100 ft. + 10 ft./level).

You can attempt to possess a construct instead of an unattended object as your first possession with this spell. If you do, this spell acts as control constructUM, except as noted above.
target_zh: 无主（unattended）的巨型或更小的物体（最小为超小型）或者构装体
text_zh:
该法术的功能如同物体占据术（Object Possession）一般，差异如上所述。被占据的活化物体具有与其体型相应的构装生物点数（Construction Points），至多为巨型物体的5点。你的银线（silver cord; 详见本书第六章）能延伸至中距（100尺 + 每等级10尺）。

你能够尝试占据一个构装体以取代无主的物体，并以此来作为该法术的首个占据目标。若你这么做的话，该法术的功能除了上述描述以外，均如同控制构装（Control Construct; UM）一般。
